commit message: Tweak Turkish alt chars, see issue 108

Make hardcoded strings localizable

Merged from justanotherdsalt-hackerskeyboard 1300:907e0e54cb63, with prefix 'title_' added.
Move misplaced auto caps preference back to 'key behavior' section
Fix unintended UPPERCASE! triggered by shifted punctuation
Remember if the current input mode supports prediction, and re-apply that setting where appropriate instead of toggling.

Refactor mini keyboard popup

The original code was creating and destroying a full LatinKeyboardInputView for each long-press popup which seems rather wasteful.

Replace the View cache with a Keyboard cache, create a single LatinKeyboardInputView for the popup, and then call setKeyboard() on it instead of rebuilding.
